thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com | 3 of 85
thread.title: LT

author: LT
title: LT
text: Overall I was happy with what is offered on your website. The assortment and variety of cards is great, however I found it pricey. I also didn't like how you couldn't just add additional cards being sent, you had to pay for an additional package. I had some people that were forgotten initially and then I had to spend an additional $25 to send 3 cards. That structure needs to be changed. Other then that good experience.
